Rulings.HAT:
● As long as the ① has already resolved, it can't later be negated, and continues applying even if this card leaves the field.
● If one of those monsters affected by the ① is flipped face-down or leaves the field, the ① no longer applies to it.

PSCT.Vegas:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Normal Monsters
① If this card is Special Summoned: Until the end of the next turn, 
neither player can target Dragons you currently control with card effects, 
also they cannot be destroyed by card effects. 
② Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can target 1 Normal Monster in your GY; 
Special Summon it.
